EmailTemplate.name: Production Return Order Quote - Initial Request (CSR Generated)
EmailTemplate.subject: Production Return Order Quote {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Production Return Order Quote
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We’ve completed the evaluation of your production return unit (Part number: {!Case.Product_Part__c}, Serial number: {!Case.Product_Serial_Number__c}) for your PO No.{!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}, and we’re ready to get to work.
But before we can get started, we need your updated purchase order. We’ve included the findings report and quote for your review.
If you believe the report to be inaccurate, please let us know, and we’ll launch a review to double-check your claim.
Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
Questions?
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, when you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
